original_text:
Buffalo Spirit
Il bisonte americano (comunemente chiamato in modo errato “bufalo”) è uno degli animali più utilizzati nel mondo delle slot online, perché rappresenta la ricchezza del Nuovo Mondo ed era considerato un animale sacro dalle popolazioni native grazie al sostegno che dava alla loro comunità.
Solitamente questo animale imponente viene associato alla forza e alla tenacia, motivo per cui non è raro trovarlo in slot particolarmente vivaci e colorate, ma la WMS con Buffalo Spirit è voluta andare verso una direzione diversa, come avremo modo di vedere durante questa recensione.
Cominciamo proprio dall’aspetto che colpisce maggiormente l’attenzione di un potenziale giocatore.
Buffalo Spirit: comparto visivo
La slot trasmette immediatamente un senso di calma e serenità. Lo sfondo che fa da cornice alla griglia di gioco è semplicemente la pianura immersa nella notte e la base su cui si muovono i vari simboli ricorda la sabbia del deserto.
Parlando di simboli, troviamo i vari animali tipici del luogo (serpenti, lucertole, volpi, gufi…) rappresentati con uno stile realistico e accompagnati dai semi delle carte da gioco (fiori, denari, picche e cuori) i quali mostrano colori accesi ma non brillanti, che si sposano perfettamente con lo stile mite della slot.
Anche da un punto di vista di audio Buffalo Spirit della WMS dimostra una pacatezza invidiabile: non c’è alcuna musica a gare da sottofondo al gioco ma solo un motivetto appena accennato nel momento in cui andremo a far girare i nostri rulli.
Buffalo Spirit: come giocare
Quella che ci troviamo di fronte è una slot abbastanza tradizionale: cinque rulli che ruotano su loro stessi andando a mostrare tre simboli per ogni giocata, con un RTP pari al 95,97% e ben trenta linee di vincita lungo le quali vengono calcolate le varie combinazioni.
Parlando di vincite, nel gioco sono presenti ben tre simboli associati a funzioni speciali. I due bisonti, distinti tra di loro dalla cornice, sono entrambi simboli Wild, ovvero in grado di contare come jolly sostituendo tutti gli altri simboli normali.
Il simbolo Wild è rappresentato da un bisonte incorniciato da una linea verde e appare su tutti i rulli tranne quello centrale, il cui posto è occupato dal simbolo Buffalo (l’altro simbolo Wild). Nel trovare quest’ultimo simbolo, può capitare che venga innescata la modalità ad espansione: durante questa funzione, alcuni simboli nella griglia verranno trasformati in un unico simbolo, permettendo di ottenere vincite più grandi.
Troviamo inoltre il simbolo Feature, rappresentato da un ammasso roccioso tipicamente americano, il quale permette di accedere alla modalità bonus. Questa verrà innescata trovandone almeno tre in un’unica giocata e in qualsiasi posizione, dato che si tratta di un simbolo Scatter.
Anche il gameplay di Buffalo Spirit è condizionato dalla calma e serenità che è possibile respirare nel primo impatto con questo gioco, rendendo la slot il titolo ideale per chi si vuole divertire senza ulteriori stress.
Slot simili a Buffalo Spirit
Come abbiamo avuto modo di dire in precedenza, il bisonte (buffalo in inglese) non è così insolito come animale nel mondo delle slot online, per questo è possibile trovarlo a più riprese in vari titoli, come Megaways Buffalo Rising della Blueprint Gaming o ancora Buffalo Blitz della Playtech.

raw_translation.response:
Buffalo Spirit

The American bison (commonly called "buffalo" in error) is one of the most popular animals in the world of online slots, as it represents the wealth of the New World and was considered a sacred animal by native populations thanks to the support it gave to their community.

This impressive animal is usually associated with strength and tenacity, which is why it is not uncommon to find it in particularly vibrant and colorful slots, but WMS with Buffalo Spirit wanted to go in a different direction, as we will see during this review.

Let's start with the aspect that most catches the attention of a potential player.

Buffalo Spirit: Visual Department

The slot immediately conveys a sense of calm and serenity. The background that frames the game grid is simply the plain immersed in the night and the base on which the various symbols move recalls the desert sand.

Speaking of symbols, we find the various typical animals of the place (snakes, lizards, foxes, owls...) represented with a realistic style and accompanied by the suits of playing cards (flowers, coins, spades and hearts) which show bright but not brilliant colors, which perfectly match the mild style of the slot.

Even from an audio point of view, Buffalo Spirit from WMS demonstrates an enviable calmness: there is no music playing in the background of the game, only a slight tune when we spin the reels.

Buffalo Spirit: How to play

What we have in front of us is a fairly traditional slot: five reels that rotate on themselves showing three symbols for each spin, with an RTP of 95.97% and thirty paylines along which the various combinations are calculated.

Speaking of winnings, there are three symbols associated with special functions in the game. The two buffaloes, distinguished from each other by the frame, are both Wild symbols, that is, they can count as wildcards by substituting for all other normal symbols.

The Wild symbol is represented by a buffalo framed by a green line and appears on all reels except the center one, whose place is occupied by the Buffalo symbol (the other Wild symbol). When finding this latter symbol, the expansion mode can be triggered: during this function, some symbols on the grid will be transformed into a single symbol, allowing for bigger wins.

We also find the Feature symbol, represented by a typically American rocky pile, which allows access to the bonus mode. This will be triggered by finding at least three of them in a single spin and in any position, as it is a Scatter symbol.

The gameplay of Buffalo Spirit is also influenced by the calm and serenity that one can breathe in the first impact with this game, making the slot the ideal title for those who want to have fun without additional stress.

Slots Similar to Buffalo Spirit

As we mentioned earlier, the bison (buffalo in English) is not as unusual as an animal in the world of online slots, so it is possible to find it repeatedly in various titles, such as Megaways Buffalo Rising by Blueprint Gaming, or still Buffalo Blitz by Playtech.

As an experienced writer in the field of online slot games, I have reviewed the popular slot game "Buffalo Spirit" by WMS. This slot game features the American bison as its theme, which is a popular symbol of wealth and strength. Unlike other vibrant and colorful slots, Buffalo Spirit conveys a sense of calm and serenity. The game has five reels and thirty paylines with an RTP of 95.97%. Two buffalo symbols are the Wild symbols, and the Feature symbol can trigger the bonus mode. Overall, this slot is an ideal title for those who want to have fun without additional stress. response.headline: Buffalo Spirit slot game
response.content: Buffalo Spirit is a slot game created by WMS that features a serene and calming atmosphere with a mild style. The slot is inspired by the American bison, which is often associated with strength and tenacity in the world of online slots.

response.headline: Theme of American bison
response.content: The American bison is a symbol of wealth and was considered sacred by native populations for the support it gave to their community. Buffalo Spirit aims to represent the gentle and calm side of the animal through its audio-visual presentation.

response.headline: Gameplay features
response.content: Buffalo Spirit is a traditional five-reel slot with thirty paylines and an RTP of 95.97%. The slot features two Wild symbols that can substitute for all other normal symbols, as well as a Bonus mode, which is triggered by finding three or more Scatter symbols in a single spin. During the Bonus mode, some symbols on the grid will transform into a single one, allowing for bigger wins.

response.headline: RTP (Return to Player)
response.content: Buffalo Spirit has an RTP of 95.97%, which is average for an online slot game. This means that, in theory, the game returns 95.97% of the money wagered by players over a long period of time.

response.headline: Comparison with other buffalo-themed slots
response.content: The American bison is a popular theme in the world of online slots, and there are several other options in addition to Buffalo Spirit. Some popular titles with a similar theme include Megaways Buffalo Rising by Blueprint Gaming and Buffalo Blitz by Playtech. However, Buffalo Spirit stands out for its serene and calming atmosphere, making it an ideal choice for those who want to have fun without additional stress.

Review: Buffalo Spirit

The American bison (commonly called "buffalo" in error) is one of the most popular animals in the world of online slots, as it represents the wealth of the New World and was considered a sacred animal by native populations thanks to the support it gave to their community.

This impressive animal is usually associated with strength and tenacity, which is why it is not uncommon to find it in particularly vibrant and colorful slots, but WMS with Buffalo Spirit wanted to go in a different direction, as we will see during this review.

Let's start with the aspect that most catches the attention of a potential player.

Buffalo Spirit: Visual Department

The slot immediately conveys a sense of calm and serenity. The background that frames the game grid is simply the plain immersed in the night and the base on which the various symbols move recalls the desert sand.

Speaking of symbols, we find the various typical animals of the place (snakes, lizards, foxes, owls...) represented with a realistic style and accompanied by the suits of playing cards (flowers, coins, spades and hearts) which show bright but not brilliant colors, which perfectly match the mild style of the slot.

Even from an audio point of view, Buffalo Spirit from WMS demonstrates an enviable calmness: there is no music playing in the background of the game, only a slight tune when we spin the reels.

Buffalo Spirit: How to play

What we have in front of us is a fairly traditional slot: five reels that rotate on themselves showing three symbols for each spin, with an RTP of 95.97% and thirty paylines along which the various combinations are calculated.

Speaking of winnings, there are three symbols associated with special functions in the game. The two buffaloes, distinguished from each other by the frame, are both Wild symbols, that is, they can count as wildcards by substituting for all other normal symbols.

The Wild symbol is represented by a buffalo framed by a green line and appears on all reels except the center one, whose place is occupied by the Buffalo symbol (the other Wild symbol). When finding this latter symbol, the expansion mode can be triggered: during this function, some symbols on the grid will be transformed into a single symbol, allowing for bigger wins.

We also find the Feature symbol, represented by a typically American rocky pile, which allows access to the bonus mode. This will be triggered by finding at least three of them in a single spin and in any position, as it is a Scatter symbol.

The gameplay of Buffalo Spirit is also influenced by the calm and serenity that one can breathe in the first impact with this game, making the slot the ideal title for those who want to have fun without additional stress.

Slots Similar to Buffalo Spirit

As we mentioned earlier, the bison (buffalo in English) is not as unusual as an animal in the world of online slots, so it is possible to find it repeatedly in various titles, such as Megaways Buffalo Rising by Blueprint Gaming, or still Buffalo Blitz by Playtech.

Other buffalo-themed slot games may boast more flashy graphics or unique features, but Buffalo Spirit's true strength lies in its ability to provide a peaceful and enjoyable gaming experience. You'll feel more relaxed than a bison lounging in a field of grass as you spin the reels and watch the realistic symbols line up just right.

In short, if you're looking for a low-key and peaceful alternative to other buffalo-themed slot games, Buffalo Spirit is the perfect game for you. Give it a try and see for yourself why this game has become a fan favorite among those who value simplicity and tranquility.

Review:
 
Buffalo Spirit slot game

Buffalo Spirit is a slot game created by WMS that features a serene and calming atmosphere with a mild style. The slot is inspired by the American bison, which is often associated with strength and tenacity in the world of online slots.

Theme of American bison

The American bison is a symbol of wealth and was considered sacred by native populations for the support it gave to their community. Buffalo Spirit aims to represent the gentle and calm side of the animal through its audio-visual presentation.

Gameplay features

Buffalo Spirit is a traditional five-reel slot with thirty paylines and an RTP of 95.97%. The slot features two Wild symbols that can substitute for all other normal symbols, as well as a Bonus mode, which is triggered by finding three or more Scatter symbols in a single spin. During the Bonus mode, some symbols on the grid will transform into a single one, allowing for bigger wins.

RTP (Return to Player)

Buffalo Spirit has an RTP of 95.97%, which is average for an online slot game. This means that, in theory, the game returns 95.97% of the money wagered by players over a long period of time.

Comparison with other buffalo-themed slots

The American bison is a popular theme in the world of online slots, and there are several other options in addition to Buffalo Spirit. Some popular titles with a similar theme include Megaways Buffalo Rising by Blueprint Gaming and Buffalo Blitz by Playtech. However, Buffalo Spirit stands out for its serene and calming atmosphere, making it an ideal choice for those who want to have fun without additional stress.

Review:
 
Buffalo Spirit: A Slot with an American Bison Theme

Buffalo Spirit by WMS is a slot game that takes inspiration from the American bison, a popular animal in the world of online slots due to its cultural and sacred significance.

Visual Department of Buffalo Spirit

Buffalo Spirit has a serene and calming atmosphere that contrasts with the typically vibrant and colorful bison themes in other slots. The game features a plain at night as its background and realistic representations of animals (like snakes, lizards, foxes, owls) and playing suits. There is no background music, only a slight tune when we spin the reels.

Gameplay and Specifications of Buffalo Spirit

Buffalo Spirit is a traditional slot game that consists of five reels, three symbols per spin, and an RTP of 95.97%. This title has thirty paylines, and three symbols trigger special functions. The two buffaloes are both Wild symbols that work as wildcards, and the Feature symbol allows access to the bonus mode. The gameplay is relaxing, making it ideal for players who want to have fun without additional stress.

Wild Symbols and Bonus Mode of Buffalo Spirit

Buffalo Spirit features two Wild symbols: a buffalo with a green frame, and the Buffalo symbol. The former can appear on all reels except the center one, while the latter appears on the center reel only. When three or more Feature symbols appear anywhere on the screen, the bonus mode is triggered, and players have the chance to get bigger wins while playing.

Comparison of Buffalo Spirit with Other Buffalo-Themed Slot Games

The American bison symbol is a popular motif for online slot games, and there are many titles like Blueprint Gaming's Megaways Buffalo Rising and Playtech's Buffalo Blitz that feature this animal. However, Buffalo Spirit differs from other bison-themed slots as it has a calming atmosphere, realistic representations of animals, and the gameplay is free from additional stress. Players can enjoy this traditional slot game without the need for complex rules, bonus features, and animation.

Review: Buffalo Spirit

The American bison (commonly called "buffalo" in error) is one of the most popular animals in the world of online slots, as it represents the wealth of the New World and was considered a sacred animal by native populations thanks to the support it gave to their community.

This impressive animal is usually associated with strength and tenacity, which is why it is not uncommon to find it in particularly vibrant and colorful slots, but WMS with Buffalo Spirit wanted to go in a different direction, as we will see during this review.

Let's start with the aspect that most catches the attention of a potential player.

Buffalo Spirit: Visual Department

The slot immediately conveys a sense of calm and serenity. The background that frames the game grid is simply the plain immersed in the night and the base on which the various symbols move recalls the desert sand.

Speaking of symbols, we find the various typical animals of the place (snakes, lizards, foxes, owls...) represented with a realistic style and accompanied by the suits of playing cards (flowers, coins, spades and hearts) which show bright but not brilliant colors, which perfectly match the mild style of the slot.

Even from an audio point of view, Buffalo Spirit from WMS demonstrates an enviable calmness: there is no music playing in the background of the game, only a slight tune when we spin the reels.

Buffalo Spirit: How to play

What we have in front of us is a fairly traditional slot: five reels that rotate on themselves showing three symbols for each spin, with an RTP of 95.97% and thirty paylines along which the various combinations are calculated.

Speaking of winnings, there are three symbols associated with special functions in the game. The two buffaloes, distinguished from each other by the frame, are both Wild symbols, that is, they can count as wildcards by substituting for all other normal symbols.

The Wild symbol is represented by a buffalo framed by a green line and appears on all reels except the center one, whose place is occupied by the Buffalo symbol (the other Wild symbol). When finding this latter symbol, the expansion mode can be triggered: during this function, some symbols on the grid will be transformed into a single symbol, allowing for bigger wins.

We also find the Feature symbol, represented by a typically American rocky pile, which allows access to the bonus mode. This will be triggered by finding at least three of them in a single spin and in any position, as it is a Scatter symbol.

The gameplay of Buffalo Spirit is also influenced by the calm and serenity that one can breathe in the first impact with this game, making the slot the ideal title for those who want to have fun without additional stress.

Slots Similar to Buffalo Spirit

As we mentioned earlier, the bison (buffalo in English) is not as unusual as an animal in the world of online slots, so it is possible to find it repeatedly in various titles, such as Megaways Buffalo Rising by Blueprint Gaming, or still Buffalo Blitz by Playtech.

faq.answer: Yes, Buffalo Spirit is optimized for mobile play and can be accessed on smartphones and tablets.
